I can assist you with any queries regarding libraray support in LPU like finding books, how many books we have, and what book u should prefer for your course.

patterns: I want to search library management system in ums.
I want to go on library management system.
responses: You can search lms by clicking on home button and then to ums navigation. There u can find lms.

patterns: Which books should i prefer for my subjects.
Books preference according to my subjects.
responses: U can prefer the books for your respective subjects with the help of your academic syllabus's Text books authorised.

patterns: How can i borrow a book from library.
how to take a book from library
responses: U can take a book from library as per your need after issued by librarian

patterns: how can i contact to librarian
responses: U can meet to librarian directly in library, or u can mail him via library management system in ums.
U can know about the books that have issued to you via 'Books issued from library' option in ums.

patterns: how to find discussion room booking
responses: U can book discussion room via your ums account in library managememnt section or can visit library for more info.

patterns: can I take reserved books from library.
how to take reserved books from library
responses: You can not borrow the reserved book . They are for reading purpose in library only .
